name: Wall Hit
description:
Swipe the platform and bounce the balls into the basket. Have fun with the simple and joyful mechanics.

If you throw enough balls into the basket, you’ll pass a level. If you miss a ball, you’ll lose it until you have no more balls left. But don’t worry! You will continue from the same level!

Progress in levels and complete the challenges to unlock 20 unique skins. The higher your level, more challenging will be the game. Is it difficult for you? Do you want easy levels again? From some levels you can reset your level progress and get additional starting balls!

Unlock the ultimate random function, that mixes all unlocked skins!
